title: The Determinism Problem
location: Berkeley, California - Coffee Shop Near Campus

elliot_state.temporal_awareness: Wrestling with free will vs determinism
key_realizations: Free will might be determinism experienced from inside
Choice matters even within predetermined systems
His father was wrong about free will being meaningless

cassandra_state.philosophical_position: Free will exists in quantum uncertainty gaps
cassandra_state.support_level: Actively helping Elliot process existential crisis
cassandra_state.relationship_evolution: Moving from distant ex to philosophical partner

plot_progression.philosophical_foundation: Established - determinism and free will as complementary
plot_progression.decision_framework: Being built - how to make choices in bootstrap loop

themes_developed.burden_of_knowledge: Knowing future constrains but doesn't eliminate choice
themes_developed.fathers_legacy: Elliot beginning to transcend father's philosophy

key_quotes: Free will isn't a switch that's either on or off. It's a spectrum.
Even if you know which domino will fall, someone still has to push it.
